title: "AI Training Method Exceeds GPT-3 Performance with 99.9% Fewer Parameters"
excerpt: "Exploiting Training (PET), a deep-learning training technique for natural language processing (NLP) models. Using PET, the team trained a Transformer NLP model with 223M parameters that out-performed the 175B-parameter GPT-3 by over 3 percentage points on the SuperGLUE benchmark."
